website_summaries.verdict: It works, thanks to the 1% Clotrimazole formula, but other options may work just as well for most skin fungal issues for less money.
pros: Formulated specifically to treat ringworm, but also effective for other fungal infections
Garners praise for how well it controls itch and reduces redness
cons: Less than an ounce per tube for the price
Product may separate after being stored for long periods of time, especially in warm locations

customer_reviews.title: Can be used on Humans and dogs or cats.
customer_reviews.text: We brought this to treat our cats that had ring worm and to also treat our selves because we had picked up the r ringworm when we handled the cats. It worked well on the cats and on my wife and I . You should treat your self and the cats or dogs all at the same time to rid you house of the ring worm. This does work and does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Thousands of Books Read

customer_reviews.title: Not useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stuff before buying Clotrimazole because it was more expensive and hence seemed the better option. Lotrimin did literally nothing for me. Waste of money. Then I bought clotrimazole for 1/5th the cost and started seeing the difference within a week
customer_reviews.author: Rujuta

customer_reviews.title: Works but takes a few weeks...be patient!
customer_reviews.text: Had what appeared to be ringworm on the back of my thigh just above the back of my knee. Circular itchy reddish border...at first I didn't know what it was and it lasted a week. I ordered this lotrimin and the spot disappeared in two to three weeks...still very light patch on skin but compared to what it was before this product you can barely notice it.
customer_reviews.author: John Michael

customer_reviews.title: Works well, im so glad.
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Got rid of the ringworm I had on my shoulder. Im so glad I didnt have to resort to harsher methods. My advice: dont forget to put it on twice a day You should notice a difference in the affected area by the 2.5 week kind of range. Keep at it because it takes some time for it to fully go away and you dont want it to come back.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Buy from a pharmacy
customer_reviews.text: This was on sale and can be used for jock itch and athlete's foot. It helps most infections and I like to keep my medicine cabinet stocked. The problem is it came in with no safety seals nor a box that was sealed. It could be contaminated so I tossed it and contacted amazon. They wanted the product back to restock. Poor business. Spend more money at the pharmacy to ensure that you have a sealed and unopened product!!
customer_reviews.author: Ech

customer_reviews.title: This works - use with antifungal wash for long term results
customer_reviews.text: This works. Takes some time to clear up ringworm, but pair this with a tea tree antifungal wash and it will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie M

customer_reviews.title: It worked but price is a Rip-off
customer_reviews.text: This tube has 0.42 oz. (less than 1/2 ounce) for $8.22: Active ingredient Clotrimazole 1 Percent Globe Clotrimazole Antifungal Cream is identical and gives you 5 ounces for $9.99. Here's the Amazon link: 1%
customer_reviews.author: Deborah D. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.....
customer_reviews.text: This one is on the top of my search page on fungus treatment so I guess I had high expectation on it. Well, ok the good side, It arrived on time and well packaged. However, this thing doesn’t work at all....And even make the affected area worse! After you applied, you can feel that The affected area is covered by a very thick layer of cream.( even you just use very little amount) It doesn’t give itch relief but my affected area become even more itchy ......I shouldn’t give a try....
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Hoi Yen Lam

customer_reviews.title: I'll let ya know in a month...
customer_reviews.text: As the headline goes... I'll let ya know in a month. Saw something on my arm pre lockdown and thought it was tinea multicolor spreading from my neck and chest which would be odd since I've never seen TM on arms before, but after being in the sun, it is different and looks more like ringworm. How'd I get that? Who knows. We have indoor cats, but only I have it, I did some work under the house prior to LD, maybe? If it cures it, I'll let ya know, if it doesn't, I'll go to the dermatologist...
customer_reviews.author: PTS

customer_reviews.title: Works fast! There’s a few tips you should do!
customer_reviews.text: The works for ringworm well and fast. I’ve tried other creams and this is the best. I used a clean cotton swab to apply a thin layer and what you have to do is lightly rub it on the infected skin so it gets in there to do what it needs to do. If there is dry skin started to crust the rubbing is important so it reaches underneath the dead skin, otherwise the live skin doesn’t get treated!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah V.

customer_reviews.title: Use bleach or garlic
customer_reviews.text: It did not work for my ringworm... Half a tub of water couple cups of bleach... Then I ground up garlic and rubbed it on ringworm those two things cure ringworm.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Knowitall

customer_reviews.title: Not very effective
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for more than 2 weeks now. But I still don’t see it working effectively. I’m gonna try Lotrimin Ultra as suggested by one of the reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: This is the last stop for itch and burn.
customer_reviews.text: This is real medicine. Not just for jock itch. People don't know about ringworm. And more people have it thinking it's just jock itch. When in reality they have ringworm. Nearly impossible to get rid of. This is what you use to stop that stupid itch and burn! Follow the simple instructions and if you don't feel a difference, you need a doctor.

product_meta.title: LotriminAF Ringworm Cream, Clotrimazole 1 Percent, Clinically Proven Effective Antifungal Treatment of Most Ringworm, for Adults and Kids Over 2 Years, Cream, 12 Grams.42 Ounce
product_meta.description: Get relief from the itching and redness irritation of ringworm with Lotrimin AF Ringworm Antifungal Cream. The active ingredient in this ringworm fungus treatment is clotrimazole, which relieves the discomfort of ringworm symptoms and is clinically proven to cure most ringworm. Lotrimin Ringworm Cream is an odorless, greaseless formula thats easy to apply topically to affected skin. Fight fungus with the power of LotriminAF Ringworm Cream your tinea corporis is no match for this treatment that cures most ringworm. Safe for kids over 2 years of age.
feature_bullets: Provides soothing itchy skin relief: Treat itchy ringworm on the body with Lotrimin AF cream fungus treatment
Proven to cure most ringworm: Lotrimin AF ringworm cream clotrimazole cream is clinically proven to cure the fungus infection tinea corporis, commonly known as ringworm
Safe for kids over 2: Help relieve your little girl or boy of the red, itchy ringworm rash on his or her body
Does not stain: Lotrimin delivers a worry free antifungal cream treatment in a greaseless, odorless, and non staining cream that's easy to apply
Contains 1% Clotrimazole: This clinically proven ingredient relieves itchy, red skin as it treats the fungus that causes ringworm

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
